entries.name: domain
entries.desc: Domain for which this cookie applies, as a String

entries.name: expires
entries.desc: Time at which this cookie expires, as a Time

entries.name: httponly
entries.desc: True if this cookie is httponly; false otherwise

entries.name: name
entries.desc: Name of this cookie, as a String

entries.name: path
entries.desc: Path for which this cookie applies, as a String

entries.name: secure
entries.desc: True if this cookie is secure; false otherwise

entries.name: parse(raw_cookie)
entries.desc: Parse a raw cookie string into a hash of cookie-name=>Cookie pairs.

entries.name: httponly=(val)
entries.desc: Set whether the Cookie is a httponly cookie or not.

entries.name: secure=(val)
entries.desc: Set whether the Cookie is a secure cookie or not.

entries.name: to_s()
entries.desc: Convert the Cookie to its string representation.

entries.name: value()
entries.desc: Returns the value or list of values for this cookie.

entries.name: value=(val)
entries.desc: Replaces the value of this cookie with a new value or list of values.
